name: Tormore School House
description: Creative living by the coast, currently delivering Christmas wreaths, inspired by the beauty of Deal. Designs include: Bluebell Woods, Middle Street, Wellington Parade and Marine Chateau. Email or direct message via Facebook or Instagram
address: 2 Tormore Mews Rectory Road, Deal, CT14 9SX
safetyTips: Masks and gloves worn, socially distanced doorstep delivery or collection.
